name: Silverland Bến Thành
address: 14 - 16 Le Lai, Quận 1, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam
description:
Silverland Bến Thành nằm ở trung tâm Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh và gần Công viên Trung tâm. Chỗ nghỉ này cung cấp WiFi miễn phí trong toàn bộ khuôn viên.

Silverland Bến Thành nằm cách Chợ Bến Thành chỉ 1 phút đi bộ và Nhà thờ Đức Bà 800 m.

Phòng nghỉ lắp máy điều hòa tại đây được trang bị tiện nghi pha trà/cà phê, chai nước miễn phí, két an toàn và máy sấy tóc.

Silverland Ben Thanh nằm cạnh chợ Bến Thành, cách ngã tư các đường Lê Lợi và Nguyễn Huệ một quãng đi bộ ngắn.

Alles was heel schoon en leek vrij nieuw. De locatie is goed, naast de overdekte markt en als je de achteruitgang neemt zijn er ook wat supermarkten. Het overdekte luxe winkelcentrum is ongeveer 10 minuten lopen.

review.room_type: Phòng Spring Field (Không Có Cửa Sổ) Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
This is a beautiful hotel. Our room was upgraded and we gained a room with a fantastic view. 
We loved the little touches such as the pink cushions and rafia basket to use at the pool. 
The swimming pool was pleasantly warm and we liked to watch the sun go down as we swam. We also enjoyed using the sauna on our last day.
The afternoon tea was delicious and one day there was live musical entertainment with it.
The staff were extremely kind and helpful and gave us information and ideas. 
We could not fault our stay - we were just sad to leave.

El grifo de ni bañera estaba roto y se soltó al 2do día. También había una pieza de la regadera suelta.

Había reservado un taxi para las 5:45 am y la persona de recepción con quien lo hable lo había pedido para la tarde. Al final la persona de recepción  que estaba en la mañana me ayudo a llamar un taxi que tuve que pagar en Cash aunque para ser justos me salio por menos de la mitad del precio que me habían dicho en el hotel

review.comment_positive:
The hotel was conveniently located, the facilities were up-to-date, and the staff were friendly and helpful. 

We were offered a welcome drink on arrival! Our room was very well equipped for a relaxing time after a long day walking around.

The architecture was even better than the pictures - it was almost as if it were a sightseeing expedition in itself.

The staff, especially Viet, Jennifer, Billy, Ha, Nancy, were very motivated and enthusiastic. They even took time out from their day to talk to us about Vietnam and Vietnamese culture. They gave us tips and made suggestions for things to do and places to eat.
review.comment_negative: It was a bit awkward having to go through the dining area to access the pool, but the inconvenience was minor. The pool area was too small for the size of the hotel, but we enjoyed the view and the infinity pool. We also enjoyed the sauna, steam room and jacuzzi.

review.comment_negative: The location is very central and is beside the big market. It is a very touristy area, which is good for some people but we wanted a more local experience which was hard to get in this area.

Sehr schön ist vor allem architektonisch der Frühstücksbereich, mit einem abwechslungsreichen Buffet und einer tollen Aussicht auf Ho-Chi-Minh Stadt.

review.comment_positive: Excel·lent servei i atenció de tot el personal (recepció, grums, restauració, equip directiu). Gràcies a tots per estar pendent en tot moment del que puguis necessitar i proporcionar un servei de qualitat. L'esmorzar és variat i ofereixen un completíssim afternoon tea. L'hotel té dues parts una de nova, moderna i una altra que han remodelat. Les dues estan molt bé. La situació és molt bona, al costat d'un turístic mercat. A pocs minuts caminant d'algunes visites com l'Òpera, l'Ajuntament... Hi ha moltes opcions de menjar al voltant, petits locals a bon preu, A prop hi ha els centre comercials: Saigon Center i el Takashimaya amb moltes més opcions de menjar i compres.
review.comment_negative: Els habitacions de pisos més baixos poden ser una mica sorolloses en algun moment del dia.

review.comment_positive: The staff at the hotel were the friendliest and most helpful that I've experienced in all of Vietnam. The hotel is tastefully decorated and is very comfortable.  The Breakfast and Tea Time food were very good.  The pool is small, but well maintained.
review.comment_negative: The hotel exceeded my expectations.  I don't have any negative comments.  Sure, the rooms, the pool, the fitness room all could be larger, but I felt their small sizes added to the coziness of the hotel.  It is a very welcoming place to stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Sense City Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
Location superb, very near to Ben Tanh market. The vicinity also a plus point,  all within walking distance. 
Takashimaya is about 10mins walk, however traffic esp. motorbikes are very scary! 

Hotel room was just nice for us, love the simple and woody English concept. Bed, pillows & duvet was comfortable for the night sleep.

Bedroom slipper  - love!
review.comment_negative:
Bath towel - need to be replaced, material feels rough , size is small

No rainshower, no shower cubicle. So hard to take shower standing in the jacuzzi.

Toilet with bidet, is not appropriate for Asian hotels. Should be replaced.

No small rugs to wipe my feet before going up the bed

Room was too near the lift, once out of the lift you straight away reach the door of the room. Noisy & not safe. 

No mirror in the room, except that toilet mirror.  Not so great with dim light. Difficult to fix make up!

review.rating: Fijn luxe hotel met centrale ligging in District 1 van Ho Chi Minh

review.rating: A little disappointed but there is no better place!
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Sense City Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
The location was second to none! 2min to Ben Thanh and about 10min to Saigon square. Money changer, convenient store, spa, restaurants, coffee house all around. 

Front desk manager always very helpful if any inquiries and offered to make dinner reservations on my behalf. Top notch service.
review.comment_negative:
While the room and linen itself is newly fitted and very clean, I can't say the same for the bathroom. 

On the day of my arrival, the jacuzzi in the toilet was dirty which looks like stain from women menses. The.housekeeping staff immediately cleaned and was very apologetic. The front desk manager also expressed their regret on the incident. It was a little disappointing, could be a one off incident and I was unlucky 

My parents whom are staying in the next room were also not very please as their coffee and tea was not replenished after daily house keeping.

review.comment_positive:
My friend and I recently had the pleasure of staying at the hotel from January 20 to January 23, 2024.

The impeccable service provided by the staff truly stood out. From the moment I arrived, the front office staff, particularly Mr. Tom Ha Dien, demonstrated unparalleled professionalism and courtesy. Mr. Dien's excellent service greatly enhanced my overall experience, and I believe he deserves special recognition for his outstanding dedication to customer satisfaction.

Furthermore, I was impressed by the hotel's nice decor and the cleanliness of the rooms. The attention to detail in the design and upkeep of the hotel contributed to a comfortable and enjoyable stay.

I want to extend my gratitude to the entire team at Silverland Ben Thanh Hotel for creating a warm and welcoming environment. Your commitment to providing top-notch service has left a lasting impression on me, and I wanted to take a moment to acknowledge and commend your team for their hard work.

As a result of this positive experience, I can confidently say that I would choose Silverland Ben Thanh Hotel again for any future visits to Ho Chi Minh City. Thank you for ensuring that our stay was not only comfortable but also memorable.

review.rating: Stylish accommodation at the heart of Ho Chi Minh City
review.room_type: Phòng Sunshine Garden Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
- Central location
- Friendly and approachable staff member
- Roof top swimming pool with city view 
- Comfortable and clean
- Availability of toiletries and supplies 
- Laundry service and supply of bottled water
- Stylish/instagrammable cafe and restaurant, with great service
- Staff availability and security
- Hair dryer is more powerful than conventional ones
- TV has Netflix, YouTube and internet
- WiFi connectivity is great
- Loving the selection of drinks in the minibar and hot drink availability
review.comment_negative:
- If you book more than one room, you will need to specify if you want them on the same floor, or you may be separated from your group. 
- the bathroom needs to be improved. The door doesn’t close well. The bathtub feels wobbly and would recommend silicone around edges of the bathtub. The shower curtain is also not highly practical. 
- depending on the room type, the room size can feel small.
- swimming pool closes around 8? And sauna around 10pm. I guess there was an element of health and safety, but Ho Chi Minh City has a lot to offer, so was not able to avail of these facilities.
- our room came with afternoon tea. We were out at all times, so wasn’t able to avail of the afternoon tea between 14:00-15:30. It would have been great if that was an optional experience. 
- Overall feels like the room and hotel are closed to as advertised. Pricing wise - it was definitely on the higher end despite being heavily discounted. It is worth the stay and it’s one of the more unique Silverland hotels available. But you can definitely get more value for money as well if the unique decor is not an important factor

review.rating: Great hotel in a great location. I would love to stay here again.
review.room_type: Phòng Sunshine Garden Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: I’m so happy that I stayed here. The location is perfect, with many of the most interesting sights a short walk from the hotel, and everything you need nearby. The staff is so genuinely friendly and helpful, the restaurant and pool at the top has a great view of the city, the rooms are clean and very comfortable, and the hotel has lots of charm and character as well. The breakfast and the complementary afternoon tea is great. I would love to stay here again. I think it’s worth it to pay a little extra for rooms with a city view on the top floors. Mine was absolutely beautiful.
review.comment_negative:
The pool is small, so it might be full if you want to take a real swim and not only a dip. But it only happened once the week I was there, so most of the time it's not a problem. And the sunset from the pool is absolutely amazing. 
The walls between the room can be a bit thin, but the staff is very helpful if you want to change room.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Sense City Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: Az elhelyezkedése mindenképp megfelelő. Sétatávolságra van minden. A szoba és a fürdőszoba megfelelő. A Medence nem túl nagy, viszont egy meleg nap után kellemes. A Spa is megfelelő méretű.
review.comment_negative: A reggeli választéka kicsi. Nem működött a kávégép. A személyzet nem beszél angolul, kivéve 1-2 főt a recepción.

review.rating: Heart of Ben Thanh traffic and all.
review.room_type: Suite Square Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: Newly renovated with an organic feeling designed right in the heart of Ben Thanh.  Bed was comfortable and the staff were very helpful especially the chief of operations, Jennifer L.
review.comment_negative: The suites are all located at the front of the building facing the incredibly busy and noisy “square” below.  Book something away from the front if you want quiet.  The internal noise was an issue for me…the bathroom doors opening and crashing closed in other bathrooms nearby was a bad design as well as a hallway that creates an echo chamber.  Lastly, the pool is too small and can only accommodate 10 chairs max which are often full leaving you with  no options.

review.rating: Modernes top Hotel mit super freundlichem Personal
review.room_type: Phòng Signature Ben Thanh Giường Đôi (Kèm Trà Chiều)
review.comment_positive:
Das Hotel wurde erst vor kurzem saniert und ist wirklich schön geworden. Nicht so ein Standardhotel, wie man es sonst kennt. Bei Ankunft haben wir ein Upgrade auf ein größeres Zimmer bekommen. Obwohl unser Zimmer nach vorne zur viel befahrenen Straße lag, war es trotzdem angenehm ruhig. Das Personal ist super super freundlich und hilfsbereit. Unser Wasserhahn war locker und 2 Minuten später war jemand zur Reparatur da. Der Pool auf dem Dach ist auch top!
Super ist auch der Afternoon-Tea, bei dem man kostenlos Kaffee, Tee, Kuchen, Obst und frisch gebackene Waffeln verzehren kann. Wir würden das Hotel wieder buchen, auch die Lage ist super - alles fußläfuig erreichbar!

review.room_type: Phòng Sunshine Garden Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
Nous avons tout adoré ! Cet hôtel est fantastique, vous trouverez tous les équipements dont vous aurez besoin, même + que ce qu’il n’en faut ahah ! 
Tout était parfait nous reviendrons sans hésiter ! 
La nourriture également très très bonne. 
Le personnel est adorable, vous aide pour tout !
review.comment_negative: Le personnel restauration du soir ne comprenait pas toujours ce qu’on leur demandait, soit parce qu’ils ne parlent pas assez bien l’anglais, soit on ne se comprenait pas je ne sais pas, mais ils étaient tout de même très gentil. Et peut être faudrait-il nettoyer les vitres du coter restaurant pour apprécier encore mieux la jolie vue !

review.room_type: Phòng Signature Ben Thanh Giường Đôi (Kèm Trà Chiều)
review.comment_positive: Die Lage des Hotels ist super und es beeindruckt durch einzigartiges Design. Das Zimmer war hell und wir hatten eine tolle Sicht auf die Stadt.  Die Lage ist erstklassig und kann man von dort aus problemlos die bekanntesten Sehenswürdigkeiten ablaufen. Das Personal war stets bemüht und freundlich. Das Frühstücksbuffet war lecker und es gab eine große Auswahl.
review.comment_negative: Unser Zimmer war recht klein und es gab nicht viele Orte, wo man den Koffer hätte ablegen können. Zudem war direkt über uns im 11. Stock der Fitnessraum und wenn dort oben Sport getrieben wird, bekommt man das darunter leider auch mit. In unserem Duschraum hatten wir leider eine recht große Ameisenstraße von der Badewanne bis unter den Temperaturregler der Dusche. Das Personal hat sich zwar darum gekümmert, nachdem wir es gemeldet haben und daraufhin waren es zumindest so wenig Ameisen, dass sie uns nicht mehr gestört haben.

review.rating: Perfection is possible, they do it
review.room_type: Phòng Sunshine Garden Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: This hotel is something special. It's without a doubt my favorite hotel in the world. It's located centrally in Saigon near all the restaurants, bars and shops. The hotel is very stylish, in mint condition and clean to perfection. The staff makes you feel welcome and are extremely helpful, polite and Nice. I booked for 5 days and extended my stay for an extra 5 days. I really find it difficult to leave here. The rooms are very clean, new and spacious for a very reasonable price. It has a rooftop pool and restaurant with an amazing view of the city. It has a coffee bar downstairs with the best coffee, tea and healthy juices. I would recommend this hotel to anybody. It's very quite at night so you get a good night Sleep to Explore this amazing city

review.comment_positive: Fabulous hotel, rooms are spacious and nicely decorated. All guests can use gym, sauna and jacuzzi and swimming (on the rooftop!). I was positively surprised with their afternoon tea, which has a form of a mini lunch (tea, coffee, juice, sweet and sour finger food). Location of the hotel is excellent, just next to the Ben Thanh market and in walking distance to most of HCMC attractions. Service at the hotel was really great. Staff was very friendly and helpful. In the very last day of our stay we could leave our baggage after check out and still enjoy hotels facilities (afternoon tea, pools). Many thanks to Ha and Anna for great service (girls you are amazing!) and Johnny for helping us with transportation and our luggage.

review.comment_positive:
Super Lage, alles fussläufig zu erreichen.
Tolles Frühstück, inklusive der Aussicht und der umwerfenden Architektur.
Die Zimmer sind sehr groß und sauber.
Die überaus freundlichen und hilfsbereiten Mitarbeiter. Insbesondere möchten wir hier Hannah, Anna und Pham danken. Sie haben uns auf unserer Reise sehr geholfen und einige entscheidende Tipps gegeben. 
Ladet euch die App „Vexere“ herunter, dort kann man VIP Busse in sämtliche Richtungen zu einheimischen Preisen buchen. Vielen Dank Anna für diesen tollen Tipp und deine beherzte Ausdauer mit uns. 
Es war das beste Hotel auf unserer kompletten 4 wöchigen Vietnamreise von Süd über Zentral nach Nord Vietnam. Wir kommen definitiv wieder!

review.rating: Beautiful hotel in the middle of the city with lovely staff
review.room_type: Phòng Signature Ben Thanh Giường Đôi (Kèm Trà Chiều)
review.comment_positive:
The location of Silverland Ben Thahn is perfect, in the middle of the city with easy access to everything and right next to the huge Ben Thahn market. From the moment we arrived we were greeted with warm hospitality from all of the hotel staff. My husband and I were celebrating our wedding anniversary and we were gifted a bottle of wine as well as a lovely bunch of flowers. The hotel itself is really beautifully designed, so different to any other hotel I've stayed in. 

The room we stayed in (Signature) was huge and had all the amenities that we would ever need. The bed was very comfortable and we loved the spa bath and separate toilet. 

The breakfast was yummy, a full buffet and there are freshly cooked options as well. The afternoon tea was also a nice treat. 

The pool area was very peaceful after a long day. 

I would thoroughly recommend this hotel, it was a really nice treat at the end of our holiday, everything was perfect.

review.room_type: Phòng Signature Ben Thanh 2 Giường Đơn (Kèm Trà Chiều)
review.comment_positive:
Besonders imponiert, dass sehr gute Frühstück im imposanten Dach, Restaurant des Hotels. Man hat eine gewaltige Auswahl und einen großartigen Blick auf die Stadt, kombiniert mit einem außergewöhnlichen Design der Räume.
Die Lage ist für Ausflüge zu den Sehenswürdigkeiten von Saigon hervorragend, der Ben Tannenmarkt ist direkt vor der Haustür, alle anderen Attraktionen sind fußläufig zu erreichen. Das Hotel ist gepflegt und Restaurant und Pool sind absolut sehenswert!

review.comment_positive:
Stayed here twice. Once on arrival for 8 days of sightseeing then for a couple of days before going home.  
  
Staff very polite and friendly, Jennifer (Operations Manager) went out of her way to make me feel welcome and would regularly stop for a chat. Apologies to other members of staff I talked with but I'm not good with names!  

The breakfast and afternoon tea food was fresh and light with dishes that would vary from day to day. 

The room itself was large, light, airy. And a properly connected internet TV!  Room service was prompt whether for food or laundry. 
  
Central location, easy to walk to Independence Palace, Central Post Office etc, shopping area or the riverside.  
  
Next time I'm in Ho Chi Minh I will definitely stay here again.

review.room_type: Phòng Signature Ben Thanh Giường Đôi (Kèm Trà Chiều)
review.comment_positive:
The staff was fantastic. Every person I met was kind and helpful, but Thomas and Thu were phenomenal!
The room was very cute and felt less cramped than it looks in pictures. I got upgraded to a Deluxe Room. 
The view was so much fun because I could watch the traffic at night without the noise. There was absolutely no outside noise audible!
The pool was nice and warm.
Food was excellent with a wide variety of options. I also liked the afternoon tea.
review.comment_negative:
The filter of the AC needed cleaning. Sometimes it caused a slightly unpleasant smell, thought it wasn't bothersome.
Maybe some sign pointing at the afternoon tea would be handy because I got confused and ended up at the bar instead.

review.room_type: Phòng Signature Ben Thanh Giường Đôi (Kèm Trà Chiều)
review.comment_positive:
Silverland Ben Thanh is a fascinating,  beautiful hotel, uniquely crafted, in a thriving, central location.
One of a kind, this oasis was designed by studio21 architects in Ho Chi Minh. Earthy and sometimes industrial finishes are shaped into nurturing curves which make every corner of the hotel feel welcoming and inviting. 
Above all, the hotel team were charming.  Tom at front of house made us feel like honoured guests even on arrival a little exhausted after a long journey, and again after we'd checked out and were waiting for our flight. He also recommended some of the best vegetarian food we've ever eaten, at Hum Restaurant and Lounge.
Johnny looked after our baggage after we'd checked out so we could peruse nearby markets, Antique Street and the city's Museum of Fine Arts. And Hannah was so engaging and professional in all her dealings with us, always making us feel at home. Each of them really shone in terms of their service.
Also must mention our lovely room and view out to the hustle and bustle. Nevertheless the room was really quiet, cool and the linen particularly comfortable.
We have been to Vietnam many times and our stay here just made us want to return all the more!

Tolles Hotel! 
Personal sehr freundlich und aufmerksam. Toller Ausblick vom letzten Stockwerk. Zimmer groß. Von 14.00-15.30 gibt es gratis Nachmittags-Tee mit einer guten Auswahl plus live Musik. Das beste Frühstücksbuffet was wir auf unserer Reise hatten. Nach 2 Wochen endlich mal Vollkorntoast. 
Als die Managerin auf uns zu kam und sich nach Feedback erkundigte, teilten wir ihr mit dass es toll wäre wenn das Gym ein wenig besser ausgestattet wäre. Haben ihr ein Bild von einer Langhantel gezeigt, sie kannte das nicht und hat sich das sofort notiert. Sie wirkte sehr bemüht.
review.comment_negative:
Ein großer Schrank im Zimmer, jedoch wären Haken an der Wand für Jacken oder Handtücher super. Ebenso fehlte bei uns ein Ganzkörperspiegel. 
Die Badewanne scheint auch ziemlich in die Jahre gekommen. Stattdessen könnte man eine schöne Dusche einbauen.

review.comment_positive: 2023年10月に出来たばかりだそうで、建物が新しく綺麗で、デザインもとてもおしゃれでした。ベンタイン市場がすぐ隣な上に人気のレストランも近くにたくさんあり、非常に便利な場所にあります。スタッフさんが全員感じよく、出入り口が階段なのですがサッとスーツケースを持って案内してくれました。また、流しのタクシーを拾おうとしていたところタクシー会社へ連絡してくれてすぐに呼んでくれたり、grabの運転手と電話しておりベトナム語がわからず困っていたら代わりに話してくれたりと、大変親切にしてくださいました。ありがとうございました。

review.comment_positive:
Beautiful interiors with amazing views. Amazing breakfast with fruits and homemade croissants, pancakes and oriental soups and rices. 
We had cocktails and a seafood dinner when  we arrived overlooking the city lights.
It's in a great location near to everything we wanted to see and do and opposite Ben Than market which is good for first ourchases like sandals and hats. Loved getting up early for a swim in the rooftop. Staff are incredibly polite and helpful here. Nothing is too much trouble. The manageress Jennifer made our stay extremely welcoming when we wanted to stay an extra night and ensured we kept our room. The coffee shop downstairs has lovely juices aswell. The bar staff and waiters were all friendly and cheerful. There's also a good in-house spa area. Everything is incredibly clean and comfortable.

review.comment_positive: The hotel is beautiful! Service was amazing! Staff were helpful, polite and informative. The location is great too. Very close to Ben Thanh market, and all other attractions. Plenty of Halal restaurants outside the hotel for Muslims.
review.comment_negative:
1. The room is quite small. Not so suitable for families. The room we got has a weird bathroom layout. The toilet and shower are separated from end to end of the room. If you use the toilet, you have to cross over the beds and TV area to go to the shower area. 
2. The swimming pool is not kid friendly. It's quite deep and there is no area for kids to swim. Hence, quite dangerous for small kids. The access to the swimming pool is quite funny too. We had to go through the restaurant to get to the pool from the lift. Especially when you want to go to the pool at night, you have to pass by people having a nice dinner at the restaurant to reach the pool. 
3. Sometimes, there's a rubbish smell in the lift going to the room. Maybe the smell comes from the basement level, from the garbage room.

review.rating: When in Ho Chi Minh (Saigon) this is the place to stay for an outstanding personal experience.
review.room_type: Phòng Sunshine Garden Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: This is a fantastic hotel as we don't like big business hotels. From the very personal check-in procedure where you are offered a cold drink, some small snacks, a napkin to clean your hands. To the pool facility which was such a relief after a long international flight. The restaurant prepares fantastic meals, the roof top bar brings you the calmness you might need after an evening in the city.  We loved the very distinct and wonderful architecture and appreciated the amazing and kind personnel. People should treat the all with more respect! The breafast was suberb. Great variety to choose from also if you don't fancy a hot meal. We stayed here 3 days and returned after 2 weeks to add an extra night. This is when we stayed at the hotel and had an amazing 3-course dinner with great drinks and fantastic wines. We strongly recommend it!

review.rating: Great slightly quirky hotel close to all the sights.
review.room_type: Phòng Signature Ben Thanh Giường Đôi (Kèm Trà Chiều)
review.comment_positive:
Located just by the side of Ben Thanh Market and three minutes from the Fine Arts Museum, this hotel exceeded our expectations.
Refurbished completely throughout and opened just two weeks ago it was spotlessly clean and its quirky design means each room is slightly different.
The room was well appointed and the bed was so comfortable, the room was cave-like with rounded walls and a separate bathroom with a spa bath was quite unique.
Afternoon tea was an added bonus and afforded great views over the market and beyond.
An outdoor pool was great to cool down in after a day out, another bonus with this hotel.
However, all the staff made the stay extra special making you feel very welcome, and helped with any queries, unfortunately, I can't remember all the names but a special thank you to Kim, Huu, Loan, Anna, Jennifer, and especially Johnny.
Definitely looking forward to visiting again.

review.room_type: Phòng Spring Field (Không Có Cửa Sổ) Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: Das sehr außergewöhnliche Hotel liegt mitten an der Markthalle und fußläufig zu vielen Sehenswürdigkeiten. Der Check in verlief sehr freundlich und schnell. Es gab ein Getränk und Knabberein, das war sehr nett. Wir hatten für eine Nacht ein Zimmer ohne Fenster gebucht und bekamen ein Upgrate auf ein Zimmer mit Fenster. Lieben Dank! Die Betten sind sehr bequem. Der Kühlschrank mit Softgetränken stand uns kostenlos zur Verfügung, top! Die Architektur ist der Wahnsinn und mit viel Liebe zum Detail errichtet. Am Nachmittag gab es eine kostenlose Teatime. Es gab ein kleines Buffet und sogar frisch gebackene Waffeln, dazu Livemusik. Beeindruckend toller Service. Vom Restaurant hat man einen tollen Blick über die Stadt. Auf dem Dach ist ein kleiner Pool, ebenso mit toller Aussicht, einigen Liegen, Sitzsäcken und Handtüchern. Getränke und Snacks können auch hier bestellt werden. Weiterhin gibt es im Innenbereich zwei Saunen und eine runde Badewanne mit Blick über die Stadt. Uns hat das Hotel und der Service beeindruckt. Wir können das Hotel uneingeschränkt weiterempfehlen und würden wiederkommen! Weiterhin ist im unteren Bereich ein kleines Café angeschlossen.

review.comment_positive:
Silverland Ben Thank was the best hotel we stayed in whilst enjoying Ho Chi Minh City.  All staff without exception were kind and helpful and went the extra mile to make us feel at home and comfortable.
Checking in was easy.  We were welcomed with a tray of tea whilst Hannah told us about the hotel.  Once all the formalities had been done Hannah showed us to our room and invited us to afternoon tea in the dining room which was served every day for hotel guests.  It was delightful.  A good variety of tasty snacks, sandwiches, fruit and copious amounts of tea or coffee.  We met the dining room manager My and also Jennifer Lam the Operations Manager.  They were as delightful and helpful as Hannah and all their colleagues who, without exception were excellent.
Our accommodation was in a Square Suite which was brilliant.  Adequate room, a lovely view and a shower to die for.  I have never experienced such a good shower and really did appreciate it.
Breakfast was served in the rooftop dining room and was good.  There was ample choice; the service was professional and again the young people who served us were professional.  
The hotel itself is in a good position with a beautiful park nearby.  The market is across the road and the walk to the Hop on Hop Off bus near the theatre is manageable even in the heat.
Our stay was so memorable that we would most definitely want to stay at Silverland Ben Thank should we again visit Ho Chi Minh City.
review.comment_negative: There was nothing to dislike.  The hotel was superb!

review.room_type: Phòng Sunshine Garden Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: We absolutely loved the pool, with it's view over the city. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The breakfast had a wide selection of both vietnamese and western options. The restaurant also featured architectural design that we liked. The hotel is very centrally located, with all main tourist attractions within walking distance.
review.comment_negative:
Not much that can be changed, but:
The hotel is made up of what seems to be two joined buildings, with different types of rooms. Depending on what building one is in, the rooms will be more or less designery.
Given it's central location, the hotel is located at a very busy street. But with the windows closed (which will usually be the case due to the temperature) this is not really a problem.

review.comment_positive: Wir haben das Hotel aufgrund der praktischen Lage und dem außergewöhnlichen Design gebucht. Was wir nicht wussten, das Hotel hatte erst Anfang Oktober 2023 Soft-Opening, wir waren also in der dritten Woche dort. Wir waren sehr gespannt, denn die Bilder sahen verdächtig nach Computer Renderings aus, aber vor Ort sah es dann tatsächlich so schön aus. Das Personal war sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Wir haben ein kleines kostenloses Zimmer-Upgrade bekommen, im Anschluss den Afternoon Tea genossen und daraufhin gut gestärkt HCMC erkundet. In unseren drei Nächten dort, waren es angenehm wenig Gäste, denn manche Zimmer wurden noch ausgebaut. Auch am Abend haben wir einmal dort gegessen und fanden es sehr lecker, auch wenn es für vietnamesische Verhältnisse natürlich nicht günstig ist.

review.room_type: Phòng Signature Ben Thanh Giường Đôi (Kèm Trà Chiều)
review.comment_positive: All the hotels we stayed in in Vietnam were quite good, but this was the best. I have to give 10/10 to everything. The location was excellent for us, as we wanted to stay at a central location. Everything we wanted to visit was close by, including the famous Ben Thanh market. The hotel staff was super helpful and polite and guided us with everything. The breakfast spread and quality were amazing. And the rooms were so pretty, clean, and with a great view of the Saigon Square. Two days wasn't enough to appreciate all that the hotel had to offer

review.room_type: Phòng Signature Ben Thanh Giường Đôi (Kèm Trà Chiều)
review.comment_positive:
L’hôtel est très beau, le design est vraiment original nous avons adoré ! Le lit est confortable et la salle de bain est très sympa (atypique) 
Le bar tout en haut est très impressionnant la nuit je vous conseille d’y prendre un verre le soir !
La localisation est parfait ! Super pour tout faire à pied, à côté de toutes les activités. Le personnel est adorable (nous avons eu un petit problème avec la chambre et cela a été réglé très rapidement) et très serviable
review.comment_negative:
Les couloirs sont suffoquants car sans fenêtre
Les images sont en 3D donc pas fidèle à 100% a la réalité

review.rating: Lovely hotel with quiet room and fantastic infinity pool.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Sense City Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
Everything looks like the images online.  Pool is absolutely stunning with great views.  Restaurant is lovely too.

Staff in restaurant are fantastic, outstanding service and all very friendly.

Right next door to market which is great.  Very central to everything in hcm.  10 min walk to water terminal and around 15 to street market and war museum etc.

Would encourage others to book as hotel is very well maintained and is a beautiful hotel!
review.comment_negative:
Staff were welcoming on arrival.  However after checking in, there no welcome or communication from reception staff at all.  The man with the suit walked past us with no attempt to acknowledge us.  Very strange.
Would prefer the staff to have a small pool bar in the pool area, perhaps where sun lounger looks over market.
Drinks were expensive, with happy hour not enticing at all.  Everyone else offers 2 for 1.  I encourage you to do the same.
Breakfast was not great, limited choice.  Also frustrating that some mornings you would get set menu, others you have to ask.
Set menu for breakfast were like baby portions…..  not with the money in my opinion.  Handy for family before going on tours etc though.

review.comment_positive: Tout l'art de l'accueil dans cet hôtel qui change des hôtels classiques, ici les formes sont douces, tout est hyper propre et neuf. review.comment_positive: The location is good, close to local market, mall and other places to look around. High tea is good, it's better than breakfast. Steam bath and jacuzzi options are also decent.
review.comment_negative:
Property is too small. Breakfast is horrible. Very less options. Same options are repeated. Hotel staff is polite but they don't go extra mile to help, for example I asked for oats as there were too little options for veg, but they couldn't give Oat (no oat option). Oat is easily available and widely served item in breakfast worldwide. But they didn't have. 

Wifi sucks as well. No decent connectivity in rooms. 

Hotel looks big in photos, but actually it's quite small. Suggestion to fellow travellers, please don't have high hopes. It's more like a back pack traveller kinda property, with high price.

The staff was very friendly and took the time to get to know the customers and make sure everyone was comfortable. 
The hotel was located in a great location in the middle of everything. We walked around the city, but you could also easily grab a taxi/Uber in front of the hotel if you wanted to.

review.rating: Great staff, great design, splendid location, clean, overprized.
review.room_type: Phòng Signature Ben Thanh Giường Đôi (Kèm Trà Chiều)
review.comment_positive: The newly adapted rooms are a charm and really differntiate this accomodation from others. The staff is even for the high vietnamese standards overly friendly and helpfull (and that means a lot). Due to a late arrival we were not able to enjoy the facilities and room. The hotel was overly supportive, we were allowed to check out lat(er) and although late checkout was not avalible, we could use facilities in the hotel during the day after checkout. Great service!
review.comment_negative: Unfortunely, as for all hotels in the city center, the rooftop pool is too crowded/popular and therefore hard to privatley enjoy. Also the total cost for 'just the room' is on european level and not in line with the general vietnamese price level. You get a great room, however it is overprized.

review.rating: One of the better hotels to stay at.
review.room_type: Phòng Spring Field (Không Có Cửa Sổ) Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
The location is outstanding. A lot of places for example restaurants, shopping malls, sightseeing places or other stuff all within walking distance.

Excellent hospitality. During the check-in, my room was upgraded for free for the duration of my stay. All the staff have been very friendly and helpful after checking out. 
I had an early appointment and therefore had to check out early in the morning. They offered to let my luggage be stored until I was finished. There was a sudden heavy rain and this left me soaking wet upon return. The staff offered me to shower and change at their facility. Their manager guided/escorted me there and shows of their excellent service.

The interior has been renovated recently and it shows. It's very unique and calming.
On the ground floor there's also a café to satisfy your coffee or refreshing drinks needs. 
The upper floor has a nice swimming pool with view, to cool off and refresh your mind after travel and doing other tourist things 
During your stay they also include an afternoon tea which offers fresh fruits, sandwiches, waffles and other items that changes daily. The dining area plays a calming music and the view you have around the market area is lovely. A nice place to be and escape the loud and busy daily life in the city.
review.comment_negative: The shower area isnt closed off and results in the floor being wet. This will be fixed upon further renovation.

review.rating: Beautiful 4-star hotel in the heart of HCMC
review.room_type: Phòng Signature Ben Thanh Giường Đôi (Kèm Trà Chiều)
review.comment_positive:
Location is great, just located beside Ben Thanh market (grab is so cheap and convenient there, it doesn't really matter anyway if you are visiting anywhere further) 

Beautiful interior design!!! 

Rooms were clean and well maintained

Staff were proactive, friendly and helpful (we were only there for 3d so we didn't need any tours arrangements, but they coulld help you with it) 

Cute small pool that we didn't utilise because it was slightly overcrowded

Basic gym facilities to burn some calories after eating all the good food in HCMC

Located right beside Yuju spa (which btw their VIP massage is fantastic!)

There is a small Circle K just right around the corner about 3 mins walk away 

Their hand soap and body wash smells heavenly!!
review.comment_negative:
We didn't manage to have our afternoon tea set, which was included in our room rate because it was only served from 2-3pm daily at L12. We arrived around 4pm on Day 1, Day 2 we were out the whole day and Day 3 check out was at 12pm, so there was no chance for us to enjoy the afternoon tea. It would be better if the staff could arrange it at anytime of the day when requested. 

Buffet breakfast area was slightly small (given that it is a smaller scale hotel) but selection was decent

The pillow for me was too soft without much neck support but my partner likes it (it's more of a personal preference lol)

review.comment_positive:
Kunstvolle Hotel Architektur - vorallem im Innern - im Gaudi Stil mit vielen Rundungen und warmen Farben mit verschlungenen, fast höhlenartigen Gängen. Viele hübsche Dekorationen. Sehr freundliche Angestellte, netter Empfang. Schönes Bistrot im hinteren Teil mit Hinterausgang auf Strasse mit Arabischen Bazar.
Alle Sehenswürdigkeiten inkl. Ben Thanh Markt und Saigon Shoppingcenter in der Nähe.
review.comment_negative:
Hotelreception nur über steile Treppe von der stark befahrenen Strasse her erreichbar.
Zuerst wurde uns ein kleineres, allerdings sehr stilisches Zimmer als gratis Upgrade abgegeben. Am nächsten Tag dann auf unser Insistieren doch noch Umzug ins grosse Zimmer gemäss Buchung. Die nicht klimatisierten, teilweise offenen Hotelgänge sind sehr eng und weitläufig. Der Dachpool ist winzig, mit nur wenige Liegen. Das Restaurant im 11. OG ist schlecht gekühlt. Das Warm-/Kaltwasser Mischventil im Badezimmer lässt sich kaum einstellen.

Staff in the kitchen would make things to order such as omelettes, scrambelled eggs etc with no fuss

10/10 on everything there 
Beds we’re extremely comfortable and rooms were well air conditioned 
Staff were extremely helpful and went out of there way to help ,especially Jennifer who was amazing 
Rooftop pool was small but very clean 
Location is perfect with a 2 minute walk to Ben than markets and Saigon shopping centre 
Plenty of shopping close by with many restaurants also 
Highly recommend this hotel

review.rating: Sehr zentral und ein sehr ansprechendes Design
review.room_type: Phòng Signature Ben Thanh Giường Đôi (Kèm Trà Chiều)
review.comment_positive: Das Hotel liegt sehr zentral - gegenüber dem bekannten Ben Than Market. Außerdem kann man einiges wirklich gut zu Fuß erlaufen. Das Hotel besticht außerdem durch sein ungewöhnliches Design - sehr ansprechend! Die Zimmer sind nicht allzu groß, aber dennoch ausreichend. Hervorzuheben ist die Klimaanlage und die Dusche - beides funktionierte perfekt, was wir nicht immer in Vietnam erfahren konnten. Das Frühstück ist vielfältig und der kostenlose Nachmittagstee mit kleinen Speisen ist ein besonderes Schmankerl, was nach einem Ausflugsmorgen sehr angenehm ist.
review.comment_negative:
Leider ist das Haus sehr hellhörig - man hört jeden noch so kleinen Schritt und die Stimmen auf den Fluren - denn leider sind nicht alle Gäste in der Nacht rücksichtsvoll. 
Teilweise war eine Konversation mit dem Personal wegen mangelnder Englischkenntnisse etwas schwierig. 
Der Pool und die Dachterrasse sind sehr überschaubar und bei mehr als 5 Gästen schon überfüllt. Aber ganz ehrlich, man braucht mitten in der Stadt nicht wirklich einen Pool.

review.room_type: Phòng Signature Ben Thanh Giường Đôi (Kèm Trà Chiều)

review.comment_positive: sehr neues Hotel mit außergewöhnlicher Architektur, durchweg äußerst zuvorkommendes Personal, modern eingerichtete und komfortable Zimmer, sehr umfangreiches Frühstücksbuffet mit toller Auswahl, Lage unmittelbar neben dem Bến Thành- Markt und der Endstation der U- Bahn- Linie 1 (zum Zeitpunkt unseres Besuchs noch nicht eröffnet)
review.comment_negative: als etwas befremdlich empfand ich, dass mich die Hotel- Managerin beim Verfassen der der ersten Bewertungen (Google, TripAdvisor) "begleitet" hat

review.comment_negative: The need to improve their Service. Most of the staff are very young Girls which have no experience with Restaurant or Hotel Buisness. And you will feel that. For example i wait 30 minutes for a sandwich during breakfast and after that they told me i have to wait 10 Minuten more because the oven has to be heated. The refill of the Mini-Bar was included but i had to ask for…. And for my taste the Noise from the big Road was to loud- i slept with earplugs so it was ok.

We had two birthdays during our stay and Hannah not only wished us a happy birthday as we went out but also arranged for a cake to be delivered to us to enjoy! Such a special treat!

review.room_type: Phòng Signature Ben Thanh Giường Đôi (Kèm Trà Chiều)
review.comment_positive:
まず、建物内の至る所に曲線を多用したデザインがオリジナリティがあり、良かったです。
カフェや飲食スペースも充実していて、味も居心地も良かったです。
プールやサウナなどは期待してなかったのですが、それなりに良かったですよ。
スタッフの対応も良かったです。
review.comment_negative:
ひとつだけ、自分たちの滞在にとって合っていなかったのは、立地でした。
ベンタン市場の真横で、とてもツーリスティックで猥雑な立地で、子供連れの自分たちにはそこがイマイチでした。
ただ、その分、ホテルに入った瞬間の安心感はすごくありました。
ドアマンがしっかり立ってくれていて、宿泊者を迎え入れてくれるので良かったです。

review.room_type: Phòng Signature Ben Thanh Giường Đôi (Kèm Trà Chiều)
review.comment_positive: The location is great and the hotel design is lovely. The best part was the staff. They were the kindest most caring people that would do anything to make your stay perfect. I was a very difficult customer, asking to switch rooms twice as the single bed was too small in my first room and the second was a little noisy from the street. Third time was the charm. The larger bed was super comfortable. Rooftop pool was nice as was the breakfast and afternoon tea. Not only were they accomodating with my requests, I had injured myself quite badly and was unable to walk. I’d already checked out but the staff helped me up the stairs, gave me tea and a nice place to sit. They sat with me to chat and make sure I was okay to get my flight home. When it was time to leave to the airport they ordered me a grab to the rear of the building so I didn’t have to try walking on the stairs and assisted me with my luggage and instructions for the driver. They did everything to make my stay memorable and I highly recommend you stay here!
review.comment_negative: Small things, my room on the first night had a bright light at the window I couldn’t switch off and the second and third room were not as aesthetically pleasing as the third floor room.

review.room_type: Phòng Spring Field (Không Có Cửa Sổ) Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: Beautiful hotel with many enchanting architectural details in the lobby, common areas & rooms. The rooms are beautifully designed, spacious and quiet - even though the hotel is on a busy intersection you cannot hear any traffic. The breakfast is a buffet setup with an omelette station & a la carte menu if you prefer other food options. The staff greet you & offer coffee as soon as you sit down. They offered both Vietnamese breakfast & Western breakfast options. Delicious food, good range & quality. Additionally the hotel offer afternoon tea with a range of sweets, waffles, savoury snacks & drinks. Relaxing experience as there are musicians playing violins during afternoon tea. Other amenities of the hotel include a rooftop pool & cafe on the ground floor. They offer a turn down service with a chocolate on your pillow too which was a wonderful touch. Would recommend & I would love to stay again!
review.comment_negative: Initially we were upgraded to a different room type upon arrival however the room wasn't renovated & it was not displayed on Booking.com. My friend's room ended up having the AC unit leaking at midnight. We then requested a change of rooms as the rooms we were offered were not what we had booked. The staff were extremely helpful & friendly to offer us another set of rooms which were beautiful, spacious & quiet. What was originally an issue was easily solved with their wonderful customer service. Was very happy with their fast support.

review.rating: Tolles neues stylisches Hotel mit absolut freundlichen Personal
review.room_type: Phòng Signature Ben Thanh Giường Đôi (Kèm Trà Chiều)
review.comment_positive:
Wir sind angekommen und wurden herzlich begrüßt. Das Hotel ist absolut stylish und hat eine Mega Lage im District 1 direkt neben dem Markt an der größten Kreuzung. Wir hatten 2 Einzelbetten. Separate Toilette und separates Bad mit Dusche und Whirlpool Wanne. Duschgel, Shampoo, Spülung, Zahnbürsten und Pasta, Badeslipper und Mantel… standen zur kostenlosen Verfügung. Der Streit war groß. Kühlschrank Erstausstattung war ebenfalls kostenlos. Frühstück im obersten Stock mit Mega Ausblick. bestand aus einer Eierstation, asiatischen warmen Gerichten, Tee, unterschiedliche Eier, Baguettes oder Toast, Marmelade, guten Kochschinken und Salami, guter Käse und tolles Obst, Säfte…. 
Bei uns war um 14 Uhr eine Kostenlose Tea Time dabei wieder mit Obst, frischen Waffeln, Kekse, Pizza, Kaffee… 
Das Hotel hat auch einen Dachpool. Mit gutem Ausblick. Handtücher und Schwimmflügel für Kinder kostenlos. Ab 17 Uhr Happy Hour für Standard Cocktails. 2 Mojitos haben dann ca. 300.000 Dong gekostet. Gegessen haben wir abends außerhalb. Es gibt noch einen Saunabereich. Fitness hatte auch gute qualitative Geräte mit schönen Ausblick
review.comment_negative: Man ist direkt im Trubel und erst ab ca 24 Uhr wird es ruhiger. Die Fenster sind aber relativ gut.

review.rating: Nice, slightly weird hotel in great location
review.room_type: Phòng Signature Ben Thanh Giường Đôi (Kèm Trà Chiều)
review.comment_positive: Good but slightly weird hotel.  Architecture is Gaudi in HCMC.  Room was fun but overlooked a rather grim roof, and the windows were small / obscured by vegetation.  Breakfast OK ... but Vietnamese slant.  Need to ask for Western stuff.... and given that about 1/2 the guests were western I would expect more in the buffet.  Views were good, but mainly of the huge junction near the central market.  Location excellent for this btw.  Staff - especially front desk were excellent, although English was sometimes a challenge.  Make sure you check  on google maps where they send a taxi driver.  He went to a different place than we asked for!  Nice but small pool.  Good Sauna / steam room - which heat up very quickly.  Gym great!

review.rating: All in all sadly our worst stay in Vietnam
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Sense City Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
I mainly chose the Hotel because of design and location and both were quite good.
Food was decent but we had way better in Vietnam.
review.comment_negative:
It feels like a maze when you first try and get to the 12th floor, a little intro would have been nice instead of instantly cashing in.
Room service is unpredictable ( this is probably a more personal preference but we like when it is somehow predictable) - also ringing the room doorbell at 21:30 to get some goodnight chocolate is kinda cute but also annoying.
At breakfast it felt like the hotel was super overstaffed, every meter we had do dodge some staff member but they seem to share the most trivial tasks almost on a mindblowing level. I saw folks handing the same plate to 3 servers before it reached its destination. Or handing out single plates instead of providing a staple.
We also had cockroaches in the 3rd floor and I am pretty sure our room did not have 38m2 as advertised (did not measure though).
Finally the show was constructed by a total madman, you automatically flood the whole room when using.

review.rating: Schönes Hotel mit tollen Mitarbeitern - klare Empfehlung
review.room_type: Phòng Sunshine Garden Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
Mein Zimmer machte einen sehr guten Eindruck und war stets sauber. Die Ausstattung ließ aus meiner Sicht keine Wünsche offen. Das WLAN war im ganzen Hotel gut und stabil. Die Lobby, das Café, der Frühstücksbereich, das Restaurant oben, alles war super stylisch und hatte eine sehr angenehme Atmosphäre. Das Hotel liegt sehr zentral direkt am Markt, auf den man der sehr schönen Dachterasse gut heruntersehen kann. Überhaupt liefert das Obergeschoss mit der Dachterasse und dem Restaurant gerade abends einen spektakulären Ausblick. Apropos Restaurant: Die Qualität der Speisen fand ich sehr gut und habe dort gerne gegessen. 

Auch wenn die genannten Punkte für mich ausreichen, dieses Hotel zu empfehlen, und ich nichts negatives sehe, gibt es doch einen Punkt, der dieses Hotel für mich zwingend zur Wahl macht, falls ich nochmal nach HCMC reisen werde. Dieser Punkt ist das Personal. Ich habe schon in so manchem Hotel Zeit verbracht und kenne, denke ich, den Unterschied zwischen rein professioneller Freundlichkeit und ehrlicher. In diesem Hotel habe ich über alle Mitarbeiter, mit denen ich irgendwie zu tun hatte, hinweg durchweg sehr freundliche, offene und hilfsbereite Menschen getroffen und mich mit ein paar auch nett unterhalten. Das war für mich eine tolle Erfahrung, für die ich sehr dankbar bin.
review.comment_negative: Da gibt es schlicht nichts.

review.comment_positive: The pool looks nice and you have a good view on the city, but there are only 10 sunbeds and it can get crowded really quick. The breakfast was good and diverse. The breakfast room looks really nice.
review.comment_negative:
The room is quite small and looks cheap. It doesn't look as good as promoted in the picture. The bed is small and uncomfortable. The furniture and the facilities in the room are not very good. You can hear everything in the next rooms or the lobby. The bathtub looks old and quite difficult to use. I don't understand it who would use it. Just to make the humidity even bigger? 
I don't understand why they give only one card to access the room. This means that you can use the air conditioning only when you are in the room, but because of the weather it can get quite hot and humid. Also, they have a stupid elevator that work only with the card. So, if you want to go to the pool and you partner wants to go shopping, well, you can not. The elevator needs the stupid card.
The room is not very clean and on the second day we saw some grease-like stains on the sheets.
The stuff is friendly and helpful, but you feel more like a client and not a guest.

review.rating: We also hope the level of service will continue to be great and consistently in the long term.  Despite that, in the su
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Sense City Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
This is the first time I and partner decided to take a new experience with Silverland Ben Thanh. We are seeing ourselves as very detailed oriented and picky when it comes to choosing hotels for vacation/holidays. We were extremely impressed with many things that we truly think the experience was amazing. The hotel has a very convenient location and great view for afternoon tea which you can outlook the beautiful city and if you like to watch the traffic when having coffee or tea like me. There are a few staffs that I’d love to call out their names here: Johnny, Hannah, Jennifer, Trí and Như

1. The bellman was extremely friendly by helping us carry out all the luggages as soon as our car stopped at the door and further to that, Johnny makes us feel like home by the way he was so smiley and provided us with welcome drinks, to me it was really tasty plus the hotel’s decoration makes us feel even more warmer

2. Hannah helped us to check in, it really reminded me of the outstanding service last time I had in Hanoi about 4 years ago was that the feeling of being respect, appreciated and welcome. 

3. The offer we had included the free afternoon tea. Jennifer, always check in with us and make sure we order everything we’d like before the closing time of the stay’s duration and at the front of house whenever she’s around.

4. Trí and Như are the restaurant assistants I believe, they always look out for guests who are in needed consistently and always friendly whenever we call out to help us to clean the table, quick and responsive.
review.comment_negative: The only in our opinion that can be better is noise cancellation level is not the best as we can hear a lot of noise from our room at night so we hope the hotel can review and look into

review.rating: Best Hotel in Ho chi minh city with amazing staff .

review.comment_positive:
Wunderschönes hotel in mitten von ho chi minh city. Hier kann mann im hektischen Stadtleben entspannen. Der pool auf der Dachterrasse ist ein perfekter ort zur Abkühlung an heißen tagen und die aussicht geniessen. Das Ambiente des Hotels ist fantastisch, sehr leckeres Essen / Frühstück. Zimmer sind sauber, bequeme Betten. Das beste an allem ist das freundliche Personal, die sich zuvorkommend um einem kümmern, aufmerksam sind und bei jeglichen fragen zur hilfe stehen. 
Besonders hervorragend waren Hannah und Anna. Danke viel mals für eure Betreuung.
Wir kommen sehr gerne wieder. Tip hotel top Mitarbeiterinnen.

review.room_type: Suite Square Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
We booked this hotel at the last minute after we had to leave another one that was unsuitable and dirty! What a great choice: the hotel is a gem in Ho Chi Minh, close to all the main attractions and with a unique design that makes it even better.
The Japanese-inspired room was amazing: big, clean, and with all the amenities.
The afternoon tea was a pleasant surprise to have every day.
The staff is nice.
review.comment_negative: Probably because of their English, they told us that the price for breakfast was for the room, but in reality, it was per person, and it was super expensive and not worth it. This is a piece of crucial information so the staff should know how to communicate properly otherwise people end up paying too much for something that can be easily skipped.

We were very pleased with the welcome refreshments and the afternoon tea provided, and our room was very comfortable for 2 people. Most importantly, the noise level was not a concern as the room was tucked away enough but still had a window for natural light. We were impressed with the comfort of the mattress as well.

The hotel location was perfect - right next to the Ben Thanh markets. Will definitely stay here again

review.comment_positive: This was the last hotel of  our trip and it was a wonderful way to end, the hotel had been newly renovated and so was very new and quite a cool design with all curved interiors.  The room was also very nice and well designed.  The location is ideal, right across from the Ben Thanh market and a 15-20 min walk from most sights. Breakfast was great and in a lovely bright space on the top floor.  There was a wide selection of food.  The pool and rooftop view were fantastic, we didn't get a chance to use it as we were only there for a night but it looked great.  Staff were professional and welcoming, we were offered welcome drinks & snacks and they were happy to help us arrange a car to the airport.

review.comment_positive: The hotel is really nice, exceptional architecture, staff extremely friendly. Loved the swimming pool on the roof top (pool should have been also opened in the evening, but they already close it at 6 pm), breakfast was nice.
review.comment_negative: Our bathtub was leaking from under, which made quite a mess in the bathroom. I reported it, they did not do anything. At check out I reported the leak again and was actually expecting something in return, for example free shuttle to the airport. Nevertheless, they offered a shuttle for 350.000 dongs, which is three times more than Grab.

Breakfast and Wifi good.
Staff friendly and willing to hear feedback as the hotel were newly open about 3 weeks.

Overall was the comfortable stay.

review.rating: Great stay just ask about the pool
review.room_type: Phòng Sunshine Garden Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
the location in ho-chi-minh is great. everything is nearby and in walking distance.
the breakfast is good, from traditional to continental.
the rooftoop looks amazing and the view is awesome.
the bed are comfortable and the room is big and nice.
at the reception they help you for everything.
review.comment_negative:
after swimming in the pool, the colored hair of my girlfriend went green because of the chlorine. they help us to fix it with lime juice and closed the pool immediatly for this day.
they told us it was the first accident like this and an other woman had the same problem. we hope they check now the maintenance of the water. at the end they offert us the free transfer to the airport. thank you for your help.

until 10/11pm it's loud in the room from the street.
the room was clean but not superclean.
